name: Your Beyond Average Platformer Game
description:
The Super Mario Style Platformer game with Kill Medals is here!

Features:

- 3 Interesting levels!

- ENEMIES THAT GLITCH THROUGH WALLS!!! 

- PARKOUR!!!

- A BOSS LEVEL!!! 

- Kill Medals!

- Double Jumping!

               and best of all:

- NO MOUSE REQUIRED!!!

How to Play:

A = Move Right

D = Move Left

Space = Jump

Space (pressed twice) = Double Jump

Made by: Reece Hayden 

YT: DeLtaXxGun GameZ
